original_text: But a man who sleeps with another man's wife is stupid. He is destroying his own life. But a man who sleeps with another man's wife is stupid. He is destroying his own life. But a man who sleeps with another man's wife is stupid. He is destroying his own life.
korean_text: 여인과 간음하는 자는 무지한 자라 이것을 행하는 자는 자기의 영혼을 망하게 하며

sentences.original_text: But a man who sleeps with another man's wife is stupid
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 다른 사람의 아내와 함께 자는 남자는 어리석다

sentences.original_text: He is destroying his own life
